text: Tale About the Lost Time () is a 1964 Soviet fantasy movie directed by Aleksandr Ptushko.Пять экранизаций самого доброго сказочника Евгения ШварцаСказка о потерянном времени It stars Grigory Plotkin, Vera Volkova, and Lydia Konstantinova. ==Actors== *Grigory Plotkin – Petya Zubov *Vera Volkova – Marusya Morozova *Lydia Konstantinova – Nadia *Mikhail Kulaev – Vasya *Oleg Anofriyev – old Petya == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1964 fantasy movies Category:Soviet fantasy movies Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Ptushko
title: Tale About the Lost Time
